title: just hacked the account I had that i forgot the password to.
body:
I love the ign so much. I am gonna get it to 30 and eventually save enough IP to get a decent pool of runes and champs to do ranked... then everyone will fear .... the "DirtyPharmer"!!!!!

also the email linked to the account was deleted by the college i attended... so recovery was impossible. I just guessed the password i made in season 2...
